entry.title: Re @TwitterSafety Given that there are ~500 million tweets per day, making individual human review impossible, this is the most salient point. One pos...
entry.summary: Re @TwitterSafety Given that there are ~500 million tweets per day, making individual human review impossible, this is the most salient point. One possible mitigation is a shorter suspension of 6 hours instead of 12.

entry.title: Re @TeslaDiva99 Tesla car temp is automatically kept within a safe range, even when the car appears “off”, in order to protect infants & pets. That ...
entry.summary: Re @TeslaDiva99 Tesla car temp is automatically kept within a safe range, even when the car appears “off”, in order to protect infants & pets. That said, it would be more convenient to keep the car “on” for entertainment & comfort if the camera detects occupants. We will make that change.
